titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel GALLANT LADY (official number 986167) and the vessel GALLANT LADY (official number 936769); and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 9/8/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue certificates of documentation for two named vessels for employment in the coastwise trade.
